rules_text:
Whenever Riki, Legendary Heropon or another legendary permanent you control enters, choose one at random –
• Create a 1/1 green Nopon creature token.
• Other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
• Choose a creature an opponent controls. That creature can’t block this turn.
• Create a Treasure token.
notes: 2.2.1: Changed the second option to say other creatures so this won’t be a 5/4 haste sometimes.
